scripts.start: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start -w=api" "npm run start -w=frontend"
scripts.start:telegram: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start -w=api" "npm run start -w=frontend" "npm run tunnel -w=api"
scripts.export-public-code: [[ $(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null) == "main" ]] && npm run __export-public-code || echo "Current branch is not 'main'"
scripts.__export-public-code: npx betterplace-gitexporter gitexporter.config.json && cd ../memocard-public && git checkout -b main && git remote add origin git@github.com:kubk/memo-card.git && git push
scripts.generate-db-types: docker info > /dev/null 2>&1 && export $(cat .dev.vars | grep -v '^#' | xargs) && npx supabase gen types typescript --db-url $DB_URL > ./packages/api/db/databaseTypes.ts
